tag_list: agora, agora-interactive, agora-interactive-inc, agora-technologies, collaboration, convergence, sessions, social-activity, social-activity-based-computing, social-activity-based-web, social-collaboration
overview:
Andrew Prell is an inventor and serial entrepreneur. He is the Founder and CEO of Agora Technologies Inc., a software venture enabling live interaction in social media. This builds upon work done in a partnership between Bell Labs, Lucent/Avaya, Compaq, Quest, Computer Associates, and Agora Interactive, Inc., of which he was CEO. Prior to that, he was the founder of Ventures in Technology, Inc., which created the first mass-produced virtual reality arcade system. He founded and served as CEO of Alternate Worlds Technology, Inc., where he created the first US manufactured virtual reality system. He has worked at Autodesk and consulted for Hewlett Packard as their â€œEast Coast Industry CAD Expertâ€.

Mr. Prell holds two patents and is named as an inventor in a third.
